text: @Amy_Siskind @Unity82222320 Every day I'm more convinced that COVID-19 did not originate in Wuhan, only "went viral" in Wuhan. Not unlike the Spanish Flu which started in the US, I won't be surprised to learn there's a reason the WH doesn't want any research done or information released.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
